items.sentence: I don't think you realize how important this is.
If I'd had more time, I would've written to you.
Tom suspects that everyone is talking about him.
Tom could hardly wait to see the children again.
After the accident, Tom decided to stop skating.
Tom is one person I never want to talk to again.
Tom speaks beautiful French, without any accent.
Tom told me he could come on any day but Monday.
Tom says he's able to communicate with the dead.
Some people think communication isn't important.
